Articles.Content: I had clicked on my tracking station to double check on a satellite orbiting the Mun and noticed a red polar orbit ring around Kerbin. AP is at 5,991,519m and PE is 5,714,001m. It also says "Agency: Zaltonic Electronics" and has 8 equally spaced points moving around it. No idea where it came from, anyone know what it is? I'd post a pic but don't know how on here.

It's the target for a contract you are either being offered, or have already agreed to perform. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

To post pictures here, you will need to upload your screenshots to a file sharing service such as Imgur.com (it's free), and copy the BBCode link they provide into your posts here.

It's the orbit required by a satellite contract, should you choose to accept it.

Happy landings!

edit: Ninja'd
I was thinking it was KSP's version of the Red Ring of Death...
Lol at Kryxal's reply, well played. And for the other two thank you very much.
